DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate tolerance effect unmedicated subject elevate IOP .
DOC.brief_title: SYL040012 . Tolerance Effect Intraocular Pressure Subjects With Intraocular Pressure ( IOP ) > = 21 mm Hg
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate tolerance effect unmedicated subject elevate IOP . An unmedicated subject consider person without IOP/glaucoma treatment least one month recruitment .
DOC.criteria: Both gender . > /= 18 year age elevate IOP OAG diagnosis . Subjects must provide sign informed consent prior participation studyrelated procedure IOP > /= 21 mmHg < 30 mmHg three different assessment day . Normal Ocular test ( eye ) : Visual field : 242 equivalent Normal OCT BCVA : > /= 0,5 ( 20/40 ) Snellen scale , < /=0.3 LogMar . Normal Schirmer Test . Normal funduscopy . Pregnant breastfeeding female positive pregnancy test . Females childbearing potential use medically acceptable contraceptive method selection hole study . Current relevant disease , include respiratory disease , cardiovascular , endocrine , neurological , hematological , renal , neoplastic , hepatopathy , gastrointestinal distress , hypertension infectious acute process . Previous chronic process rebound characteristic could interfere study accord investigator 's judgment . Having use betablockers corticoid sporadically last 15 day whichever route administration . Previous eye refractive surgery Subjects visual alteration 3 dioptre hypermetropy and/or astigmatism . Use contact lens last 7 day start treatment . Subjects participate clinical trial past 2 month study entry . Analytic alteration medically relevant , investigator judgment . Positive result test drug abuse selection period . Subjects least 2 visual field fiber layer measure two different day abnormals History ocular infection inflammation within past 3 month Pachymetry ( middle cornea ) > 600 microm < 500 microm . Subjects IOP associate close angle glaucoma History chronic severe acute ocular disease ( i.e . scleritis , uveitis , blepharitis , conjunctivitis herpes simplex virus ) History intolerance component drug formulation Subjects previous iridotomy IOP relate close angle glaucoma . Previous ocular surgery glaucoma Corneal refractive surgery ( e.g. , keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc )
